text: 12.28 Apo 13.1, Lom 12.6, Epe 2.20, 4.11-12 Pen God ne binɨb yad yɨl mɨdupsek, kɨli keke wog gɨnɨgel agɨl, kɨlop anɨgɨl aglup. Ogɨnap ned aglek, bɨ Jisas takaw nop dad ameb wog ak gɨpal. Ogɨnap nab ak aglek, bɨ God gos ñek agñeb wog ak gɨpal. Ogɨnap nab peŋ ak aglek, kɨli God binɨb ne kɨlop takaw agñɨtep gep wog ak gɨpal. God abe aglek, ogɨnap tap mageptek okok gɨpal, ogɨnap binɨb tap gup okok gel kɨlop suŋ lup, ogɨnap binɨb kɨlop yɨmug nɨŋɨd dɨtep gɨpal, ogɨnap God binɨb ne okok kɨlop kod mɨdɨl agel, wog ayɨp gɨtep gɨpal, ogɨnap takaw yɨbɨl keke apal.
